about_the_game:
In genres ranging from romance, fantasy, drama, to even science fiction, Love Criminals is a Visual Novel game exclusively designed for you, and it has the potential to make you fall in love with one of the 5 HEROINES in this incredible story, offering more than 10 DIFFERENT ENDINGS.

Hinode is a young man who decided to spend his vacation at the mansion of a distant uncle, while the owner is away taking care of his health. Suddenly, Hinode finds himself in a great dilemma: are the girls he caught trespassing on Mr. Masami's property just unknown cousins or a gang of thieves and impostors?

At every moment, gestures, words, and actions reinforce both possibilities, leaving the legitimate nephew of the magnate completely confused.

The story is told from the perspective of the main character using a first-person narrative, allowing you to fall in love with one of the 5 HEROINES in this incredible story, leading to more than 10 DIFFERENT ENDINGS.



Solve mysteries by playing as Hinode in Uncle Masami's mansion and get ready to engage with suspicious, lost, legendary, and mysterious characters.

Seijuro Hinode is a student on vacation, who only wanted to take advantage of the temporary commitment to take care of Uncle Masami's pool and spend a few days in his mansion while the owner is away indefinitely. However, he didn't expect to encounter mysterious girls who claim to be nieces of Uncle Masami. Driven by his desire to protect his uncle's mansion, knowing that he is the only genuine nephew, Hinode does what he can to uncover the truth about these girls.


Follow any of the five beautiful HEROINES as you progress through the game! Each one has unique personalities and captivating stories to tell!

Megumi is apparently the leader of a gang of thieves. She is responsible for taking care of her sister Secil and keeping everything under control. She has an enormous sense of protection, both from her friends and from Mr. Masami. Among the girls, she is the one with the most athletic build as she plays tennis. Despite having a difficult personality, she is perfectly capable of winning you over.


It's hard to tell if she's joking or being serious. When she drinks, Nara becomes uninhibited. Something in her past makes her even more mysterious. She is the oldest in the group and seemingly carries a history on the fringes of the law.


Younger sister to Megumi, Secil has a very low degree of sensitivity. Extremely rational and straightforward, she speaks her mind. She suffers from a rare disorder that inhibits her ability to feel or perceive her own emotions. She has an extremely curious nature that gives her intelligence well above average.


Found alone and abandoned in the mansion's attic, Momo is a sensitive, delicate, and disoriented girl. She suffered a sudden loss of memory and doesn't know how she ended up on the property or how long she has been living alone there. Always hungry, Momo shows fear when encountering anyone else.
Her presence in the mansion is unknown to everyone until Hinode finds her and tries to uncover the true origin of this mysterious girl.


Oyumi lived in the mansion many years ago and was the daughter of an important lord from the Edo period. She harbors intense jealousy towards her father, a prominent physician, and dislikes her new stepmother. After a tragedy in her family, Oyumi was ensnared in a spell, and now, with her mysterious appearances throughout the mansion of the current owner, Mr. Masami, she makes everyone shudder in fear like a specter lost in the night.



Tutor and friend to Hinode, Nagaoka is a highly talented inventor dedicated to the development of gynoids. Despite his young age, he has experience in relationships and is curious to hear the detailed story of Hinode and his girlfriend.

Hidden among the bushes, Mayu unexpectedly emerged in defense of Mr. Masami's property, confronting Hinode and the other intruders of the mansion. Her actions arouse suspicions in Hinode, but one thing is certain: she knows more than anyone about this place and the Hiwasaki family.


Long ago, the majestic mansion located in Tokyo, Japan, was the residence of important individuals. The current owner, Hiwazaki Masami, is both the uncle of Seijuro Hinode and a mysterious figure. Traces of his personality can be found in various areas of the mansion, such as the garage, attic, office, library, and even in a collection wing.

The current mansion of Hiwazaki Masami was also the residence of the grand lord Iori-sama, the father of Oyumi. A leap through time allows you to explore an arc of the mansion in the Edo period from the late 19th century. Players will be able to explore unexpected locations such as the roof, cellar, Nightingale Lake, tennis court, among other secret environments. All scenes from the first season strictly take place somewhere on this vast property.

5 POSSIBILITIES OF ROMANCE


Some of them are suspected of being thieves, but that doesn't mean they can't get involved in a relationship or that they can't just have fun.
Each character has their own lives and personal stories that you can experience if you spend enough time with them. Make your decisions wisely, and who knows, Hinode might even be lucky enough to score a date with one of them? Keeping the flames burning will allow you to unlock special scenes and that special someone.

DETAILED CHARACTER SPRITES

Each character's sprite features multiples poses with a wide variety of costumes that fit each of the different settings in the game, alongside a large number of facial expressions to perfectly capture their emotions throughout the dialogue and scenes!

SCENE ILLUSTRATIONS


Dive even deeper into the illustrations depicting Hinode and his suitors in scenes that showcase exciting, fun, and memorable events from the story! Each scene artwork is hand-drawn with beautifully rendered 3D backgrounds, tailored for each dialogue line to provide a more immersive narrative experience!
